subtitle: The pack that adds the Mob Vote entities.
description:
This pack adds the 5 entities from the mob votes, excluding the Phantom and Glow Squid as they are already in the game.

Entities:
The Lurker - Random squid spawn
The Great Hunger - Random spider spawn
The Blaze Knight - Random blaze spawn
The Iceologer - Evokers spawned in cold biomes
The Moobloom - Cows sspawned in flower biomes
The Glare - Random bee spawn
optifine: OptiFine is used to add support for custom entity models and random entity textures.
